Basic:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { Pagination } from "@ark-ui/vue";
</script>

<template>
  <Pagination.Root
    v-slot="{ pages }"
    :count="5000"
    :page-size="10"
    :sibling-count="2"
  >
    <Pagination.PrevTrigger>Previous Page</Pagination.PrevTrigger>
    <template v-for="(page, index) in pages">
      <Pagination.Item
        v-if="page.type === 'page'"
        :key="page"
        :value="page.value"
      >
        {{ page.value }}
      </Pagination.Item>
      <Pagination.Ellipsis v-else :key="index" :index="index">
        …
      </Pagination.Ellipsis>
    </template>
    <Pagination.NextTrigger>Next Page</Pagination.NextTrigger>
  </Pagination.Root>
</template>
Customized:
<script setup lang="ts">
import { Pagination } from "@ark-ui/vue";
</script>

<template>
  <Pagination.Root
    v-slot="{ pages }"
    :count="5000"
    :page-size="20"
    :sibling-count="3"
    dir="ltr"
    :translations="{
      nextTriggerLabel: 'Next',
      prevTriggerLabel: 'Prev',
      itemLabel: (details) => `Page ${details.page}`,
    }"
  >
    <Pagination.PrevTrigger>Previous</Pagination.PrevTrigger>
    <template v-for="(page, index) in pages">
      <Pagination.Item
        v-if="page.type === 'page'"
        :key="page"
        :value="page.value"
      >
        {{ page.value }}
      </Pagination.Item>
      <Pagination.Ellipsis v-else :key="index" :index="index">
        …
      </Pagination.Ellipsis>
    </template>
    <Pagination.NextTrigger>Next Page</Pagination.NextTrigger>
  </Pagination.Root>
</template>
